### bump

```{r input-bump}
bump <- read.table(
  "../dat/airline-bumping-2017.txt", 
  header=TRUE, sep="\t",
  stringsAsFactors=FALSE)
bump
```

### fd

```{r input-fd}
fd <- read.table("../dat/fat.txt")
names(fd) <- c(
  "case", 
  "fat_b", 
  "fat_s", 
  "density", 
  "age",
  "weight", 
  "height", 
  "bmi", 
  "ffw", 
  "neck", 
  "chest",
  "abdomen", 
  "hip", 
  "thigh", 
  "knee", 
  "ankle",
  "biceps", 
  "forearm", 
  "wrist"
)
head(fd)  
```

### Save everything

```{r save}
save(bump, fd, file="../dat/module02-datasets.RData")
```
